hadith.text: Narrated Ishaq bin 'Abdullah bin Abi Talhah:that Rafi' bin Ishaq informed him, saying: "I and 'Abdullah bin Abi Talhah entered upon Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri to visit him. So Abu Sa'eed said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) informed us: "The angels do not enter a house in which there is an image or a picture
